name: FOGG
description:
Pick up your mouse or stylus, turn on some chill music and get cozy - it's time to make some art.

F O G G lets you paint pictures on a small canvas, with three starting colors available and then sell them to buy up to six other colors. Challenge yourself to see what you can do with these tolls and most importantly, have fun!

*

Here are some useful things to know:

1. The brush has some texture to it that is more prominent the faster you make your strokes and the bigger the size of the brush.

2. Value of your art is calculated by taking into account the time you spent drawing and the amount of pictures you have already sold.

*

This game was made in Visual Studio by me and two of my friends for a school project, and inspired by Passpartout.

Art by DennisByDEN. 

Code by DennisByDEN., Mac&Cheesecake and Milan Đ.

*

If you love this game look up my other games on itch.io. Comment your experience and feel free to contact me via email (dennisbydengames@gmail.com)! Follow my work and see you in my next projects and games!!!
